nodes.excerpt: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.

nodes.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 想象一下，卖掉所有你不再使用的年度订阅，而且不能退款。我们帮助您做到这一点。简而言之，无人喜爱是一个买卖二手科技订阅的平台。
localize.tagline: 二手技术订阅市场

nodes.excerpt: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。

nodes.excerpt: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
nodes.title: Postpace - Productivity platform for writers, bloggers & teams
nodes.author: Muntasir Rashid

localize.description: Postpace是一个生产力平台，供作家、博客作者、营销人员和团队自动化他们的主题研究工作流程，并快速构建内容摘要。Postpace通过分析来自Google的任意关键字的前15-20个有机结果来帮助研究主题。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和团队的生产力平台

localize.description: Postpace是一個生產力平臺，供作家、博客作者、營銷人員和團隊自動化他們的主題研究工作流程，並快速構建內容摘要。Postpace通過分析來自Google的任意關鍵字的前15-20個有機結果來幫助研究主題。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和團隊的生產力平臺

nodes.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.

nodes.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
nodes.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!
nodes.author: Ann Elnekave

localize.description: 在给孩子们访问他们最喜欢的应用程序之前，问题会问一个快速学习的问题……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕里！1Query不是完全的限制，而是为孩子们创造了无限的机会，让他们在游戏中学习。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看电视的时间变成学习时间！

localize.description: 在給孩子們訪問他們最喜歡的應用程序之前，問題會問一個快速學習的問題……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕裏！1Query不是完全的限制，而是爲孩子們創造了無限的機會，讓他們在遊戲中學習。

nodes.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.

localize.description: PC Builder是一个网站，帮助人们创建兼容的PC部件列表，而不会遇到任何兼容性问题。这个网站是以初学者为中心创建的，其主要目标是让每个人都能轻松兼容。

nodes.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
nodes.title: gSweets - Save time in Google Docs with Notion-like shortcuts
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

localize.description: gSwets劈开命令可以节省您的时间，并让您保持流畅的状态。我们的第一批快捷方式可以让你格式化文本、添加截图、搜索表情符号、GIF和库存照片。今天就把它免费添加到Chrome中吧。设计成100%私密的。
localize.tagline: 使用类似概念的快捷方式在Google Docs中节省时间

localize.description: gSwets劈開命令可以節省您的時間，並讓您保持流暢的狀態。我們的第一批快捷方式可以讓你格式化文本、添加截圖、搜索表情符號、GIF和庫存照片。今天就把它免費添加到Chrome中吧。設計成100%私密的。

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
nodes.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes
nodes.author: Ayoub Moustaid

localize.description: 停止花费大量时间在多个部门(包括IT、商业、人力资源、法律、医疗、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文档。使用Fastdok生成即用型文档，只需回答几个问题，即可在几分钟内完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需几分钟即可工作的文档

nodes.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
nodes.title: Flex Widgets - A widget editor for iPhone and iPad
nodes.author: Yannik Schrade

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一个真正的Widget编辑器。它允许您通过在小部件上放置元素，然后编辑、移动、调整大小和分层这些元素来自由构建小部件。所有这些都在一个超级直观的编辑器中完成。
localize.tagline: 适用于iPhone和iPad的小部件编辑器

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一個真正的Widget編輯器。它允許您通過在小部件上放置元素，然後編輯、移動、調整大小和分層這些元素來自由構建小部件。所有這些都在一個超級直觀的編輯器中完成。
localize.tagline: 適用於iPhone和iPad的小部件編輯器

nodes.excerpt: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
nodes.title: The Work From Home Backdrop - Physical backdrop for video calls and Zoom meetings
nodes.author: Samuel alex

localize.description: 糟糕的背景是否意味着你的视频通话、虚拟约会和缩放会议让团队失望了？你的虚拟背景没有给人留下深刻印象吗？在家工作背景只需几秒钟即可安装，并立即将您的空间转变为动态域。
localize.tagline: 视频通话和缩放会议的物理背景

nodes.excerpt: Tomato 2 is a Pomodoro timer. It's simple, pretty and still pretty powerful– it has goal tracking, various modes of operation, website/app blocking and fun stats.

nodes.excerpt: Planning to take time off this holiday season? The automatic out-of-office calendar from Clockwise makes it effortless to coordinate with your team. Simply mark your calendar OOO and Clockwise will sync your availability to the shared team calendar.
nodes.title: Automatic out-of-office calendar - Just mark your calendar as OOO, we take care of the rest
nodes.author: John Lilly

localize.description: 这个假期你打算请假吗？来自顺时针的自动外出日历使您可以毫不费力地与您的团队进行协调。只需将您的日历标记为OOO，顺时针就会将您的可用性同步到共享的团队日历。
localize.tagline: 只需将您的日历标记为OOO，我们会处理睡觉

localize.description: 這個假期你打算請假嗎？來自順時針的自動外出日曆使您可以毫不費力地與您的團隊進行協調。只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，順時針就會將您的可用性同步到共享的團隊日曆。

nodes.excerpt: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.

nodes.excerpt: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.

localize.description: dLinks允许您在几秒钟内在Web 3.0上构建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名称是分散的域，任何人都不能通过挡路访问。天网提供无法关闭的分散式后端托管。

localize.description: dLinks允許您在幾秒鐘內在Web 3.0上構建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名稱是分散的域，任何人都不能通過擋路訪問。天網提供無法關閉的分散式後端託管。
localize.tagline: 一個易於使用的、無代碼的Web3.0站點生成器

nodes.excerpt: The fastest way to the smartest Google Search. 'Picked by LINER' is the most powerful assistant that will take your Google Search to the next level. Do not scan through all results. View only the pages selected by LINER. Available as browser extensions.
nodes.title: Improved Google Search by LINER - The smartest Google Search assistant powered by highlights
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 实现最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班轮挑选”是最强大的助手，它将把你的谷歌搜索提升到一个新的水平。不要浏览所有结果。仅查看由线框选择的页面。作为浏览器扩展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮显示提供支持

localize.description: 實現最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班輪挑選”是最強大的助手，它將把你的谷歌搜索提升到一個新的水平。不要瀏覽所有結果。僅查看由線框選擇的頁面。作爲瀏覽器擴展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮顯示提供支持
